messages.outOfResources: Action blocked because the server doesn't have the resources for another call.
messages.roomTooBig: Action blocked because it'll exceed the maximum room size. Learn more about room sizes at https://mindgamesnl.github.io/OpenAudioMc/voicechat.html
messages.tooManyRooms: Action blocked because this server already reached the room limit. Learn more about room limits at https://mindgamesnl.github.io/OpenAudioMc/voicechat.html
